function.name: AddBroadcastTeamTarget
function.DescriptionEN: Adds a team (by index) to the broadcast list
function.DescriptionCN: 在记分板列表上增加一个组（使用索引号）

function.name: EstimateLength
function.DescriptionEN: Returns length of this scene in seconds.

function.name: FindNamedEntity
function.DescriptionEN: given an entity reference, such as?!target, get actual entity from scene object
function.DescriptionCN: 通过一个实体参照，比如!target，获取场景物体中的实际实体

function.name: IsPaused
function.DescriptionEN: If this scene is currently paused.

function.name: IsPlayingBack
function.DescriptionEN: If this scene is currently playing.

function.name: LoadSceneFromString
function.DescriptionEN: given a dummy scene name and a vcd?string, load the scene
function.DescriptionCN: 输入虚拟场景名和VCD字符串，载入场景

function.name: RemoveBroadcastTeamTarget
function.DescriptionEN: Removes a team (by index) from the broadcast list
function.DescriptionCN: 从记分板列表上移除一个组（使用索引号）

function.name: Start
function.DescriptionEN: Start scene playback, takes activatorEntity as param
function.DescriptionCN: 开始场景重播，参数为激活者实体（activatorEntity）
